title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN?? ?T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TOIDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: tips shows in given format
Actual Result: tips shows in one line
OB: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips show the content in only one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should be shown in the given format, even when the content in the text item is large.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Save and put mouse on the text item with large content.
2. Observe the tips that appear and note that they are shown in only one line.
